relationships.description: Harry has a connection with Voldemort, who is trying to come back and kill him.
Firenze saved Harry from Bane, who was angry with him for interfering with what the planets say will happen.
Dumbledore is feared by Voldemort and will protect Harry.
Snape will steal the Stone, allowing Voldemort to come back.
